title: Hat, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Norris W. Harkness
description: Woman's cap of fine white linen voile, embroidered in multi-colored silks. Narrow band on crown and bordering front in stylized design of open flower head. Sides embroidered in large stylized flower in red and yellow. At crown, a black oval of fine crocheted lace. Brown silk draw cord.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hat, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Norris W. Harkness. 1967-17-1.
